page.title: 16BUILDINGS IN BRAMSHAW AREA
page.content: There are strict building regulations in the Forest{ {FORESTRY COMMISSION HOUSES.}These are rented mainly to their workers. {OLD COTTAGES.}Many have been enlarged & modernised & are now lived in by people mostly working outside the area. The village shop is also a home. Some cottages do not have bathrooms. Drainage is either cesspool or septic tank. Electricity is mainly used for cooking and lighting but calor gas & solid fuel are also used. Some cottages have the Right of Cordage. There is no main gas available. { {SHELTERED HOMES.} There are 7 homes for the elderly with a resident warden {HOTELS AND PUBS}. There are 2 hotels & one pub.
